issue.title: [CI][Crossbow] Nightly Gandiva jar trusty job fails
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6445](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6445). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
https://travis-ci.org/ursa-labs/crossbow/builds/580192384. Error is due to use of `std::regex`; replace with RE2.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6445?focusedCommentId=16922197) by Praveen Kumar (praveenbingo):*
`[~npr]` We fixed this yesterday, will monitor tonight's job and close this when this passes

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6445?focusedCommentId=16927453) by Prudhvi Porandla (pprudhvi):*
the build is failing again

<https://travis-ci.org/ursa-labs/crossbow/builds/582833123>

with this commit <https://github.com/apache/arrow/commit/d6bc0b6f5975304367000e3090e09d4cf8af1fb9>

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6445?focusedCommentId=16931905) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Is anyone working on this?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6445?focusedCommentId=16932198) by Prudhvi Porandla (pprudhvi):*
Resolved

Build is not failing https://travis-ci.org/ursa-labs/crossbow/builds/585944097

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6445?focusedCommentId=16952554) by Prudhvi Porandla (pprudhvi):*
the build is failing again. This time because of std::regex usage in arrow dataset.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6445?focusedCommentId=17015150) by Ben Kietzman (bkietz):*
`[~pprudhvi]` I think this is resolved by https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6137 , could you confirm?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6445?focusedCommentId=17015604) by Prudhvi Porandla (pprudhvi):*
yes, we can close this ticket. Thanks.
